alert.note: Alert for Central Washington; Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington; Interior Hancock; Northern Washington (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 5:50PM EST until January 25 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 3 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches expected. * WHERE...Hancock and Washington Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 3 PM EST Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.
